Title: Enacts the housing development fund company self-determination, preservation and affordability act
Summary: Enacts the housing development fund company self-determination, preservation and affordability act to clarify certain provisions relating to the dissolution and reincorporation of housing development fund companies; provides for tax exemptions and abatements for housing development fund companies.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to enacting the housing development fund company self-determination, preservation and affordability act
